title: Calculate the Day of the Year
description:
In some automated systems, it may be necessary to calculate the day of the year based on the current date. This can be used for tracking production cycles, maintenance schedules, or other situations that require date information.
Control Requirements:
The system needs to receive date input, including year, month, and day.
Based on the input date, calculate and output the day of the year.
Considering that the number of days in February may vary each year (28 days in a leap year, 29 days in a non-leap year), the system needs to be able to identify leap years and calculate accordingly.
The output result should be an integer representing the day of the year.
If the input date is invalid (such as February 30th, April 31st, etc.), the system should output an error status and error code.
Notes:
1. The input year (Year) must be between 1000 and 3000 (inclusive), otherwise output an error status with error=true and an error code status=16#8001. If the input month (Month) is invalid, output an error status with error=true and an error code status=16#8002. If the input day (Day) is invalid, output an error status with error=true and an error code status=16#8003.
2. The result of the calculation is output through DayOfYear.
name: FB_CalculateDayOfYear

output.name: DayOfYear
output.description: Output the day of the year

output.name: error
output.description:
Error status indicator
FALSE: No error occurred
TRUE: An error occurred during execution
